🗣️ @MinaProtocol hackers We’re announcing winners tomorrow. CODE rewards for submitting have already been sent 🫡 If you’re new to the DAO head to http://guild.xyz/dd to join discord Welcome, frens 🫂
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 🚨 Announcing our latest Hackathon with @MinaProtocol !! - Kick-off workshop with @blockchainbeard on Monday @ 5pm UTC - $10,000 in Prizes (USDC, Mina, CODE) - Learn to build zkApps - Open to all RSVP for the launch workshop and full hackathon details below ⬇️ https://t.co/sVFsTfMzXq
